episode_body:
On July 23, 2025 at 02:38 AM, Justin emailed Nicoletewesmvaz5101115 regarding "Tewes Car Accident Injury Claim":

Case: Nicole-Tewes-MVA-7-5-2025
Client: Nicole Tewes
__FW: Tewes Car Accident Injury Claim__
From: Joseph Tewes
To: Justin@whaleylawfirm.com
Cc: Nikki Tewes
Justin,
I appreciate your time discussing this issue with me. Hopefully, you can help my wife and I get some better and quicker results. Long story short, my wife was hurt in a car accident on Saturday 7/5. She had pain in her neck and back that didn’t go away. She went to the ER to get examined that night. She is still having aches and pains. She has a follow up with her family doctor on July 29th. I attached the documents from her ET treatment to review. I also attached the email chain between myself and my insurance (Erie). Below is the my insurance information and claim number. At this time, we have not received any medical bills.
My Insurance – Erie Insurance
*	Claim A00006928311
*	King, Leigh < Leigh.King@ERieInsurance.com>
Progressive is the Insurance company that the other driver used. On 7/15, I had a representative reach out to me from Progressive. I gave them information on the accident and update on my wife’s condition. I explained she is still experiencing soreness, and has a follow up appointment at the end of the month. He told me in a text he plans to follow up with us on 7/30 after her appointment. Below is the information and claim number for Progressive.
*	Progressive Direct Insurance Co
*	Claim: 25-407673172
*	Rep: ETHAN EASTERDAY
*	Rep Phone Number: 859-629-4336
I also spoke with the Progressive agent below. She is handling the auto claim on Progressives end. I want to handle the auto claim myself through my Erie agent. Hopefully, I will be getting a settlement for the car soon. If you can reach out to Nachand, do you think you can get pushing on the rental coverage issue we discussed?
*	Progressive Direct Insurance Co
*	Claim: 25-407673172
*	Rep: NACHAND DOWNS
*	Rep Phone Number: 502-909-3643
Thanks,
Alex Tewes
Managing Director of Operations
m: (859) 663-0949 | o: (601) 493-9240 Ext 3210
e: Joseph.Tewes@enerfab.com

On November 20, 2025 at 12:43 PM, Justin emailed Joseph Tewes regarding "RE: [EXT] RE: Tewes Car Accident Injury Claim":

Case: Nicole-Tewes-MVA-7-5-2025
Client: Nicole Tewes
__RE: [EXT] RE: Tewes Car Accident Injury Claim__
Joseph,
I do not have a copy of this radiology bill yet. Once I have a copy of it I can forward to PIP to process. Other than that bill, I’m still waiting for the complete records/billing from Christ Hospital Physicians Primary Care. Once I have both of those I can move this case towards resolution. If you can assist in any way obtaining a formal copy of the radiology bill that would be very helpful.
From: Joseph Tewes
To: justin@whaleylawfirm.com
Importance: High
Justin,
See attached. We received a letter from a debt collection agency regarding one of my wife’s medical bills. Shouldn’t they be aware that this is an accident claim? Are we close to resolving this with the insurance company? I think the wife and I are at a point we want this to go away.
Thanks,
Alex Tewes
Managing Director of Operations
m: (859) 663-0949 | o: (601) 493-9240 Ext 3210
e: Joseph.Tewes@enerfab.com

To: 'justin@whaleylawfirm.com' >

Justin,
Do you feel like we are close to putting this to bed? I don’t believe my wife will be getting any additional treatments or follow ups. But you might want to confirm with here first.
Thanks,
Alex Tewes
Managing Director of Operations

I talked to Nikki last night. I don’t think we are going doing further treatments. Her doctor recommended going to a chiropractor, but we might have to put that off. It is too difficult to coordinate that around work and parenting. That might be an area of risk, but I don’t think there is anything we can do about that right now.

Alex Tewes

**CASE FILE ORGANIZATION COMPLETED**

Completed comprehensive 5-phase file reorganization for Nicole Tewes MVA case using systematic 8-bucket categorization system.

**Results:**
